docs.title: 毎日自動バックアップを行い完了時にLINEに通知させる
docs.text:
ファイル名「LINE.py」で以下のコードを入力します。

line_notify_tokenにはLINE API Tokenを取得して入力してください。

import requests
import sys
def notify(notification_message):
"""
    LINEに通知する
    """
line_notify_token = ''
line_notify_api = 'https://notify-api.line.me/api/notify'
headers = {'Authorization': f'Bearer {line_notify_token}'}
data = {'message': notification_message}
requests.post(line_notify_api, headers = headers, data = data)
if __name__ == '__main__':
args = sys.argv
if 2 <= len(args):
notify(args[1])

これにより、次のコマンドで関数を呼び出して通知させることができます。

import LINE
LINE.notify("[Anna計算機] バックアップが完了しました。")

また、シェルコマンド上でも使用することができます。

そのため、nohupを使用する長時間かかる解析であっても利用できます。以下に例を書いておきます。

python LINE.py "解析終了"
./LINE.py "解析終了"

docs.title: 疑問
docs.text:
• 手法
    • bins × binsによってピクセルに分割．
    • ピクセル内のDensityデータ\(W_1,W_2,\cdots\)とするとそのピクセルの描画値は\(\sum_{i=1}^{n} W_i\)である．
  • 宇宙論シミュレーションにおいて、⼤きく変動する箇所や、細部の解析箇所については粒⼦数ないしはメッシュ数を上げ、精度を上げる可変法を利⽤してるんだから、物理現象として激しい箇所のデータ数は必然的に⼤きくなる。nが⼤きければDensityを描画してるというよりもたくさんデータが多いところを濃く描画してるだけなのではないか︖

一緒になってしまうのではないか？？

docs.title: 解決
docs.text:
• 示強変数と示量変数に注意．
  • 今回のDensityは示強変数なのでhistgram2dで描画するのは不適切．
  • 示量変数であるMassesで描画をするのが適切．

docs.title: 背景
docs.text:
以下のような形でもっとも簡単な関数系は \(1 - \exp(-x)\) 。

ここを起点にFittingを行う。

docs.title: 結果
docs.text:
• \(a\left\{1 - \exp\left( - \frac{x}{b}\right) \right\}\)
  • \(a\left\{1 - \exp\left( - \frac{x-b}{c}\right) \right\}\)

docs.title: Fitting Model: Neural Rate Models
docs.text:
Note

Neural Rate Modelsとは？

Neural Rate Modelsは、神経細胞の発火率をモデル化する方法です。このモデルは、神経細胞の発火率が、その細胞の入力に対する応答としてどのように変化するかを説明することができます。

  • 脳内のニューラルネットワークの活動は、時間を追うごとに常に変化している
  • そのため、ニューロンは動的なシステムとしてモデリングすることができる (但し、動的システムを用いるアプローチは、神経科学において用いられるものの一つのアプローチに過ぎない)
  • Neural Rate Modelsは、その中でもニューロンを集団として捉え、その集団の発火率を用いることで、最も単純な形で動的なネットワーク活動を表現するモデルである
  • ニューロン集団の発火率と、その集団への入力の関係性を分析する際に、F-Iカーブがよく用いられる(F：スパイク頻度(spike frequency) I：外部からの電流(injected current))
  • F-I curveの中でもsigmoidal F-I curveは以下のような数式で表現される:
\[ c \left\{ \frac{1}{1 + \exp(-a(x-b))} - \frac{1}{1 + \exp(ab)} \right\} \]
  • \(c\) を追加．
  • 参考文献
    • 2021年の深層学習ハイライト（研究論文編）– Qiita
    • Tutorial 1: Neural Rate Models — Neuromatch Academy: Computational Neuroscience
    • Neuromatch Academy 2021(US時間)の体験談(Week2編) – note

docs.title: Fitting Model: the standard model
docs.text:
論文 (Nobuhiro Okabe et al., PASJ, 2014) で用いられているモデル。

両対数グラフで

\[ y = x^a (1 + x^b)^{-\frac{a}{b}} \]

\(\log x = X-c\)，\(\log y = Y\) として \(X, \ Y\) の関係式を導くと

\[ Y = a(X-c) - \frac{b}{a} \log\left( 1 + (e^{(x-c)})^b \right) \]

となる．

docs.title: Fitting Model: Spline Curve
docs.text:
Note

スプライン曲線（spline curve）とは、スプラインを使用して表現された曲線のことです。スプラインとは区分多項式（区分的に定義された多項式）のことです。

スプライン曲線は、コンピューターグラフィックスなどで曲線を簡単に描く手法の1つです。任意に複数の制御点を設定すると、すべての制御点を通る滑らかな曲線を描くことができます。

スプライン曲線は、図学や造形デザイン、ゲーム開発などで使用されます。

スプライン曲線には、次のような種類があります。

  • Bスプライン曲線
  • 曲線の終端処理
  • 使用する多項式

スプライン曲線は、スプライン関数によって生成されます。スプライン関数は、任意に設定された複数の点の間を、その区間ごとに多項式やベジェ関数で表し、滑らかに結ぶための関数です。スプライン関数の次数が、1次、2次と大きくなるほど表現する精度が高くなります

  • 参考文献
    • Spline Curves – Clemson University

docs.title: Comment
docs.text:
• Nelsonのrandomをやってみよう。

# make a random edge on view
phi = np.random.uniform(0, 2*np.pi)
theta = np.pi / 2
psi = 0
A_00 =  np.cos(psi)*np.cos(phi) - np.cos(theta)*np.sin(phi)*np.sin(psi)
A_01 =  np.cos(psi)*np.sin(phi) + np.cos(theta)*np.cos(phi)*np.sin(psi)
A_02 =  np.sin(psi)*np.sin(theta)
A_10 = -np.sin(psi)*np.cos(phi) - np.cos(theta)*np.sin(phi)*np.cos(psi)
A_11 = -np.sin(psi)*np.sin(phi) + np.cos(theta)*np.cos(phi)*np.cos(psi)
A_12 =  np.cos(psi)*np.sin(theta)
A_20 =  np.sin(theta)*np.sin(phi)
A_21 = -np.sin(theta)*np.cos(phi)
A_22 =  np.cos(theta)
random_edgeon_matrix = np.matrix( ((A_00, A_01, A_02), (A_10, A_11, A_12), (A_20, A_21, A_22)) )
r['edge-on-random'] = random_edgeon_matrix * r['face-on']
外部リンク

  • ビリアル半径（もしくはx2ぐらい？）で切ってoutflowを見てみる
  • なぜ左から右に流されているのは、もしかしたら近くに大きな何かがある？→大きくプロットしてみる。

# make a random edge on view
phi = np.random.uniform(0, 2*np.pi)
theta = np.pi / 2
psi = 0
A_00 =  np.cos(psi)*np.cos(phi) - np.cos(theta)*np.sin(phi)*np.sin(psi)
A_01 =  np.cos(psi)*np.sin(phi) + np.cos(theta)*np.cos(phi)*np.sin(psi)
A_02 =  np.sin(psi)*np.sin(theta)
A_10 = -np.sin(psi)*np.cos(phi) - np.cos(theta)*np.sin(phi)*np.cos(psi)
A_11 = -np.sin(psi)*np.sin(phi) + np.cos(theta)*np.cos(phi)*np.cos(psi)
A_12 =  np.cos(psi)*np.sin(theta)
A_20 =  np.sin(theta)*np.sin(phi)
A_21 = -np.sin(theta)*np.cos(phi)
A_22 =  np.cos(theta)
random_edgeon_matrix = np.matrix( ((A_00, A_01, A_02), (A_10, A_11, A_12), (A_20, A_21, A_22)) )
r['edge-on-random'] = random_edgeon_matrix * r['face-on']

from TNG_catcher.TNG_catcher import *
from TNG_catcher.New import *
h = 0.6774
df = pd.read_csv("./VirialTable.csv")
fe_num = {
"H": 0,
"He": 1,
"Li": 2,
"Be": 3,
"B": 4,
"C": 5,
"N": 6,
"O": 7,
"F": 8,
"Ne": 9,
"Na": 10,
"Mg": 11,
"Al": 12,
"Si": 13,
"P": 14,
"S": 15,
"Cl": 16,
"Ar": 17,
"K": 18,
"Ca": 19,
"Sc": 20,
"Ti": 21,
"V": 22,
"Cr": 23,
"Mn": 24,
"Fe": 25,
"Co": 26,
"Ni": 27,
"Cu": 28,
"Zn": 29,
}
abd = pd.read_csv("./solar_xspec_qiita.csv")
sei2 = "H"
group_num = 15
data_to_save = {}
for sub in [342447, 388544, 421555, 419618]:
data_to_save[sub] = {}
test = SubhaloDataSet(sub)
test.GetAllData()
test.GetSubhaloID(["GFM_Metals"], 0)
x = test.DATA[0]["x"]
y = test.DATA[0]["y"]
z = test.DATA[0]["z"]
H = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[0]
Fe = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[8]
O = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[4]
Mg = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[6]
Si = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[7]
Ne = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[5]
Data = {"H": H, "Fe": Fe, "O": O, "Mg": Mg, "Si": Si, "Ne": Ne}
cmx = test.DATA["cmx"]
cmy = test.DATA["cmy"]
cmz = test.DATA["cmz"]
viri = list(df.query(f"SubhaloID == {sub}")["VirialRadius"])[0]
r = np.sqrt((x - cmx) ** 2 + (y - cmy) ** 2 + (z - cmz) ** 2) / h
X_ = r / viri
# Xについて処理
X = np.sort(X_)
group_X = np.array_split(X, group_num)
data_to_save[sub]["group_X_Mean"] = [np.mean(i) for i in group_X]
group_X_Width = [(np.mean(i) - np.min(i), np.max(i) - np.mean(i)) for i in group_X]
group_X_Width = np.array(group_X_Width).T
data_to_save[sub]["group_X_Width"] = group_X_Width
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"] = {}
for i, sei in enumerate(["Fe", "O", "Mg", "Si", "Ne","H"]):
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei] = {}
Fe_solar = abd["aspl"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]]
H_solar = abd["aspl"][fe_num[f"{sei2}"]]
Fe_num_den = Data[f"{sei}"] / abd["atomicMass"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]]
H_num_den = Data[f"{sei2}"] / abd["atomicMass"][fe_num[f"{sei2}"]]
Y_ = (Fe_num_den / H_num_den) / (Fe_solar / H_solar)
Y = Y_[np.argsort(X_)]
group_Y = np.array_split(Y, group_num)
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei]["group_Y_Mean"] = [
np.mean(i) for i in group_Y
]
group_Y_Std = [np.std(i) for i in group_Y]
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei]["group_Y_Std"] = group_Y_Std
print("Done", sub)
print("All Done")

from TNG_catcher.TNG_catcher import *
from TNG_catcher.New import *
import matplotlib.patches as patches
import scienceplots
plt.style.use(["science","cjk-tc-font"])
df = pd.read_csv("./VirialTable.csv")
h = 0.6774

gamma = 5.0/3.0
KB = 1.3807e-16
mp = 1.6726e-24
bin = 301
plt.figure(figsize=np.array([4,3])*1.3,dpi=400)
ax = plt.axes()
sub = 342447
test = SubhaloDataSet(sub)
test.GetAllData()
test.GetSubhaloID(["InternalEnergy","ElectronAbundance","GFM_MetalsTagged"],0)
x = test.DATA[0]["x"]/h
y = test.DATA[0]["y"]/h
z = test.DATA[0]["z"]/h
m = test.DATA[0]["Masses"]
u = test.DATA[0]["InternalEnergy"]
E = test.DATA[0]["ElectronAbundance"]
cmx = test.DATA["cmx"]/h
cmy = test.DATA["cmy"]/h
cmz = test.DATA["cmz"]/h
R = test.calc_rot()
x,y,z = R@np.array([x,y,z])
cmx,cmy,cmz = R@np.array([cmx,cmy,cmz])
mu = 4/(1 + 3*0.76 + 4*0.76*E) * mp
temperature = (gamma-1)* (u/KB)* mu* 1e10
hed, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x,y,weights=temperature,bins=bin)
hedn, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x,y,bins=bin)
gg = (hed/hedn).T
plt.pcolormesh(xed,yed,gg,cmap="jet",norm=LogNorm())
# ax[i].colorbar(label="Temperature [K]")
viri = list(df.query(f"SubhaloID == {sub}")["VirialRadius"])[0]
r = np.sqrt((x-cmx)**2 + (y-cmy)**2 + (z-cmz)**2)
c = patches.Circle(xy=(cmx, cmy), radius=viri, fill=False, ec='k', lw=0.3)
ax.add_patch(c)

plt.colorbar(label="Temperature (K)")
plt.xlabel("kpc")
plt.ylabel("kpc")

# plt.yticks(color="w")

plt.savefig(f"./0213/a_temp.png",dpi=400)

fe_num = {
"H": 0,
"He": 1,
"Li": 2,
"Be": 3,

"Mn": 24,
"Fe": 25,
"Co": 26,
"Ni": 27,
"Cu": 28,
"Zn": 29,
}
abd = pd.read_csv("./solar_xspec_qiita.csv")
sei2 = "Fe"
group_num = 15
data_to_save = {}
for sub in [342447, 388544, 421555, 419618]:
data_to_save[sub] = {}
test = SubhaloDataSet(sub)
test.GetAllData()
test.GetSubhaloID(["GFM_Metals"], 0)
cmx = test.DATA["cmx"]
cmy = test.DATA["cmy"]
cmz = test.DATA["cmz"]
xx = test.DATA[0]["x"]
yy = test.DATA[0]["y"]
zz = test.DATA[0]["z"]
R = test.calc_rot()
xx,yy,zz = R@np.array([xx,yy,zz])
cmx,cmy,cmz = R@np.array([cmx,cmy,cmz])
cc = xx > cmx
x = xx[cc]
y = yy[cc]
z = zz[cc]
H = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[0][cc]
Fe = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[8][cc]
O = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[4][cc]
Mg = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[6][cc]
Si = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[7][cc]
Ne = test.DATA[0]["GFM_Metals"].T[5][cc]
Data = {"H": H, "Fe": Fe, "O": O, "Mg": Mg, "Si": Si, "Ne": Ne}
viri = list(df.query(f"SubhaloID == {sub}")["VirialRadius"])[0]
r = np.sqrt((x - cmx) ** 2 + (y - cmy) ** 2 + (z - cmz) ** 2) / h
X_ = r / viri
# Xについて処理
X = np.sort(X_)
group_X = np.array_split(X, group_num)
data_to_save[sub]["group_X_Mean"] = [np.mean(i) for i in group_X]
group_X_Width = [(np.mean(i) - np.min(i), np.max(i) - np.mean(i)) for i in group_X]
group_X_Width = np.array(group_X_Width).T
data_to_save[sub]["group_X_Width"] = group_X_Width
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"] = {}
for i, sei in enumerate(["Fe", "O", "Mg", "Si", "Ne","H"]):
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei] = {}
Fe_solar = abd["aspl"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]]
H_solar = abd["aspl"][fe_num[f"{sei2}"]]
Fe_num_den = Data[f"{sei}"] / abd["atomicMass"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]]
H_num_den = Data[f"{sei2}"] / abd["atomicMass"][fe_num[f"{sei2}"]]
Y_ = (Fe_num_den / H_num_den) / (Fe_solar / H_solar)
Y = Y_[np.argsort(X_)]
group_Y = np.array_split(Y, group_num)
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei]["group_Y_Mean"] = [
np.mean(i) for i in group_Y
]
group_Y_Std = [np.std(i) for i in group_Y]
data_to_save[sub]["abundance"][sei]["group_Y_Std"] = group_Y_Std
print("Done", sub)
print("All Done")

import numpy as np
import illustris_python as il

import h5py
with h5py.File('../data/TNG50-1/output/snapdir_099/snap_099.0.hdf5', 'r') as f:
MassTable = f["Header"].attrs["MassTable"]

MassTable

array([0.00000000e+00, 3.07367709e-05, 0.00000000e+00, 5.73879010e-06,
       0.00000000e+00, 0.00000000e+00])

with h5py.File('../data/TNG50-1/output/snapdir_099/snap_099.600.hdf5', 'r') as f:
MassTable = f["Header"].attrs["MassTable"]
MassTable

array([0.00000000e+00, 3.07367709e-05, 0.00000000e+00, 5.73879010e-06,
       0.00000000e+00, 0.00000000e+00])

basePath = "/home/nishihama/data/TNG50-1/output/"

x,y,z,m = np.array([]),np.array([]),np.array([]),np.array([])
for i in range(len(MassTable)):
if i in (0,4,5):
SubhaloData_ = il.snapshot.loadSubhalo(basePath, 99, 342447, i, fields=["Coordinates","Masses"])
x_,y_, z_ = SubhaloData_["Coordinates"].T
m_ = SubhaloData_["Masses"]
x = np.hstack((x,x_))
y = np.hstack((y,y_))
z = np.hstack((z,z_))
m = np.hstack((m,m_))
elif i == 1:
SubhaloData_ = il.snapshot.loadSubhalo(basePath, 99, 342447, i, fields=["Coordinates"])
x_,y_,z_ = SubhaloData_.T
m_ = np.full(len(x_), MassTable[i])
x = np.hstack((x,x_))
y = np.hstack((y,y_))
z = np.hstack((z,z_))
m = np.hstack((m,m_))
else:
pass

cmx, cmy, cmz = il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, 99, subhaloID=342447)["SubhaloCM"]

r = np.sqrt((x - cmx) ** 2 + (y - cmy) ** 2 + (z - cmz) ** 2)

R, m_t = np.sort(r), m[np.argsort(r)]
cum_m = np.cumsum(m_t)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

plt.plot(R,cum_m,".",ms=1)

[<matplotlib.lines.Line2D at 0x7eff53777100>]

cum_m[-1]

76.12336612640507

il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, 99, subhaloID=342447)["SubhaloMass"]

76.12337

h = 0.6774

_r = 2.1 * (cum_m * 10**10 / h / 10**15) ** (1 / 3) * (h / 0.7) ** (-2 / 3) * 10**3
min_index = np.argmin((R / h - _r) ** 2)
viri = (R/h)[min_index]
viri, cum_m[min_index]/h

(223.01907375523712, 112.16793682928187)

def GetAllData(SubhaloID):
x,y,z,m = np.array([]),np.array([]),np.array([]),np.array([])
for i in range(len(MassTable)):
if i in (0,4,5):
SubhaloData_ = il.snapshot.loadSubhalo(basePath, 99, SubhaloID, i, fields=["Coordinates","Masses"])
x_,y_, z_ = SubhaloData_["Coordinates"].T
m_ = SubhaloData_["Masses"]
x = np.hstack((x,x_))
y = np.hstack((y,y_))
z = np.hstack((z,z_))
m = np.hstack((m,m_))
elif i == 1:
SubhaloData_ = il.snapshot.loadSubhalo(basePath, 99, SubhaloID, i, fields=["Coordinates"])
x_,y_,z_ = SubhaloData_.T
m_ = np.full(len(x_), MassTable[i])
x = np.hstack((x,x_))
y = np.hstack((y,y_))
z = np.hstack((z,z_))
m = np.hstack((m,m_))
else:
pass
return x,y,z,m

def ChangeToCurrectCoordinates(x,y,z,cmx, cmy, cmz):
HalfBoxSize = 35000/2
if np.max(x) - np.min(x) > HalfBoxSize:
x[x > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmx > HalfBoxSize:
cmx -= 35000
if np.max(y) - np.min(y) > HalfBoxSize:
y[y > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmy > HalfBoxSize:
cmy -= 35000
if np.max(z) - np.min(z) > HalfBoxSize:
z[z > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmz > HalfBoxSize:
cmz -= 35000
return x,y,z,cmx, cmy, cmz

def GetViri(SubhaloID):
cmx, cmy, cmz = il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, 99, subhaloID=SubhaloID)["SubhaloCM"]
x,y,z,m = GetAllData(SubhaloID)
x,y,z,cmx, cmy, cmz = ChangeToCurrectCoordinates(x,y,z,cmx, cmy, cmz)
r = np.sqrt((x - cmx) ** 2 + (y - cmy) ** 2 + (z - cmz) ** 2)
R, m_t = np.sort(r), m[np.argsort(r)]
cum_m = np.cumsum(m_t)
_r = 2.1 * (cum_m * 10**10 / h / 10**15) ** (1 / 3) * (h / 0.7) ** (-2 / 3) * 10**3
min_index = np.argmin((R / h - _r) ** 2)
viri = (R/h)[min_index]
return viri,cum_m[-1]/h

import pandas as pd

def calcoordinates(x, y, z, cmx, cmy, cmz):
HalfBoxSize = 35000/2
if np.max(x) - np.min(x) > HalfBoxSize:
x[x > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmx > HalfBoxSize:
cmx -= 35000
if np.max(y) - np.min(y) > HalfBoxSize:
y[y > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmy > HalfBoxSize:
cmy -= 35000
if np.max(z) - np.min(z) > HalfBoxSize:
z[z > HalfBoxSize] -= 35000
if cmz > HalfBoxSize:
cmz -= 35000
return x,y,z,cmx, cmy, cmz

from TNG_catcher import *
from TNG_catcher.New import *
import scienceplots
plt.style.use(['science','cjk-tc-font'])

The following modules installed.
    - import illustris_python as il
    - import numpy as np
    - import pandas as pd
    - import os
    - import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    - from matplotlib.colors import LogNorm
    - import glob

test = SubhaloDataSet(342447)
test.GetAllData()

x,y,z,m = test.DATA[0]["x"],test.DATA[0]["y"],test.DATA[0]["z"],test.DATA[0]["Masses"]

R = np.load("subhalo342447_rot_edgeon.npy")

x,y,z = R@np.array([x,y,z])

plt.figure(figsize=(6.4, 4.8))
histed, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x,y,bins=1001,weights=m)
histed[histed==0] = histed[histed>0].min()
plt.pcolormesh(xed,yed,histed.T,cmap="bone",norm=LogNorm())
plt.colorbar(label=r"Masses ($10^{10} M_\odot$/bin)")
plt.xlabel("ckpc/h")
plt.ylabel("ckpc/h")
plt.title("subhalo = 342447 (edge-on)")
plt.savefig("edge-on.png",dpi=400)

from TNG_catcher import *

The following modules installed.
    - import illustris_python as il
    - import numpy as np
    - import pandas as pd
    - import os
    - import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
    - from matplotlib.colors import LogNorm
    - import glob

def calc_rot(x, y, z, m):
# Calculate the moment of inertia tensor
I = np.zeros((3, 3))
I[0][0] = np.sum(m * (y**2 + z**2))
I[1][1] = np.sum(m * (x**2 + z**2))
I[2][2] = np.sum(m * (x**2 + y**2))
I[0][1] = -1 * np.sum(m * (x * y))
I[0][2] = -1 * np.sum(m * (x * z))
I[1][2] = -1 * np.sum(m * (y * z))
I[1][0] = I[0][1]
I[2][0] = I[0][2]
I[2][1] = I[1][2]
# Solve the eigenvalue equation and derive the rotation matrix
eigen_values, rotation_matrix = np.linalg.eig(I)
sort_inds = np.argsort(eigen_values)
eigen_values = eigen_values[sort_inds]
R = np.array(
(
rotation_matrix[sort_inds[0]],
rotation_matrix[sort_inds[1]],
rotation_matrix[sort_inds[2]],
)
)
return R

d = np.load("./AllCutData/subhalo342447_data.npz")

test = plot_tools(d)

test.simple_plot("x", "y", "Masses")

x, y, z, m = test.output("Masses")

cmx, cmy, cmz

(25045.18, 5827.554, 34187.434)

import numpy as np

cmx, cmy, cmz = np.array([25045.18, 5827.554, 34187.434])

h = 0.6774

virial_radius = 194.9481

virial_radius = virial_radius * h

# x = np.hstack(x)
# y = np.hstack(y)
# z = np.hstack(z)
# vx = np.hstack(vx)
# vy = np.hstack(vy)
# vz = np.hstack(vz)
# m = np.hstack(m)

# np.savez("CMVonly", x=x, y=y, z=z, vx=vx, vy=vy, vz=vz, m=m)

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.colors import LogNorm

loaded_data = np.load("CMVonly2.npz")
x = loaded_data["x"]
y = loaded_data["y"]
z = loaded_data["z"]
vx = loaded_data["vx"]
vy = loaded_data["vy"]
vz = loaded_data["vz"]
m = loaded_data["m"]

times = 10
r = np.sqrt((x-cmx)**2 + (y-cmy)**2 + (z-cmz)**2)
x, y, z, vx, vy, vz, m = x[r<virial_radius*times], y[r<virial_radius*times], z[r<virial_radius*times], vx[r<virial_radius*times], vy[r<virial_radius*times], vz[r<virial_radius*times], m[r<virial_radius*times]

data = np.load("./AllCutData/subhalo342447_data.npz")
x, y, z, vx, vy, vz, m = data["x"], data["y"], data["z"], data["vx"], data["vy"], data["vz"], data["Masses"]

rot = np.load("subhalo342447_rot_edgeon.npy")
x, y, z = rot @ np.array([x, y, z])
vx, vy, vz = rot @ np.array([vx, vy, vz])

plt.figure(dpi=300)
bins = 301
xbins = np.linspace(x.min(), x.max(), bins)
ybins = np.linspace(y.min(), y.max(), bins)
hist, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=m)
plt.pcolormesh(xed, yed, hist.T, norm=LogNorm(vmin=hist[hist > 0].min(), vmax=hist.max()),)
plt.colorbar()
plt.show()

velocity_bins = 31
xmin, xmax = np.min(x), np.max(x)
ymin, ymax = np.min(y), np.max(y)
plt.figure(dpi=300)
plt.title(f"bins = {velocity_bins}")
xbins = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, velocity_bins)
ybins = np.linspace(ymin, ymax, velocity_bins)
hist_vy, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=vy)
hist_, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins))
hist_vx, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=vx)
xed, yed = np.meshgrid(xbins[1:],ybins[1:])
bins = 1601
xbins = np.linspace(xmin, xmax, bins)
ybins = np.linspace(ymin, ymax, bins)
hist_m, xed_m, yed_m = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=m)
hist_vy = hist_vy/hist_
hist_vx = hist_vx/hist_
hist_m[hist_m==0] = hist_m[hist_m>0].min()
plt.pcolormesh(xed_m,yed_m,hist_m.T,norm=LogNorm(),cmap="bone_r")
# plt.colorbar().set_label(r"velocity $y$ (km/s)")
plt.streamplot(xed,yed,hist_vx.T,hist_vy.T)
plt.ylabel("ckpc/h")
plt.xlabel("ckpc/h")
plt.show()

j=0
sei = "Mg"
basePath = "/home/nishihama/data/TNG50-1/output/"
snapnum = 99
h = 0.6774
with open("eROSITAbubble_subhaloID.txt", mode="r") as f:
subhalolist = [int(i) for i in f.readlines()]
cm = il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, snapnum, subhaloID=subhalolist[j])["SubhaloCM"]
cmx, cmy, cmz = cm
sbm = il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, snapnum, subhaloID=subhalolist[j])["SubhaloMass"]
data = np.load(f"./AllCutData/subhalo{subhalolist[j]}_data.npz")
dd = np.load(f"./cut_data/subhalo{subhalolist[j]}_data.npz")
test = plot_tools(data)
test.data["SubfindDMDensity"] = dd["SubfindDMDensity"]
test.data["SubfindDensity"] = dd["SubfindDensity"]
data = test.data
abd = pd.read_csv("./solar_xspec_qiita.csv")
fe_num = {"H":0, "He":1,"Li":2,"Be":3,"B":4,"C":5,"N":6,"O":7,"F":8,"Ne":9,"Na":10,"Mg":11,"Al":12,"Si":13,"P":14,"S":15,"Cl":16,"Ar":17,"K":18,"Ca":19,"Sc":20,"Ti":21,"V":22,"Cr":23,"Mn":24,"Fe":25,"Co":26,"Ni":27,"Cu":28,"Zn":29}
fe_abd = ((data[f"{sei}"] / abd["atomicMass"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]]) / (data["H"] / abd["atomicMass"][0])) / (
abd["aspl"][fe_num[f"{sei}"]] / abd["aspl"][0]
)
viri = test.calc_virial_radius(cm,sbm)
r = np.sqrt((data['x']-cmx)**2 + (data['y']-cmy)**2 + (data['z']-cmz)**2)
X = r/h/viri

average = np.mean(Y)

g = sns.JointGrid(
data=df,
y=f"{sei} abundance (proto-solar)",
x="R/R$_{200}$",
marginal_ticks=True,
)
g.plot_joint(sns.histplot, discrete=(False, False), cbar=True)
g.ax_joint.axhline(y=average, color="#03012d", linestyle="--", lw=1)
g.ax_joint.text(np.max(X) * 0.88, average * 1.15, "Average", color="#03012d")
g.plot_marginals(sns.histplot, element="step")
g.fig.suptitle(f"subhaloID={subhalolist[j]}")

dd = np.load("subhalo342447_data.npz")

def plot(data):
bins=301
x,y,z = data["x"], data["y"], data["Masses"]
xbins = np.linspace(x.min(), x.max(), bins)
ybins = np.linspace(y.min(), y.max(), bins)
hist, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=z)
plt.pcolormesh(xed, yed, hist.T, norm=LogNorm(vmin=hist[hist>0].min(), vmax=hist.max()))

from TNG_catcher import *
files = glob.glob("./AllCutData/*.npz")
masslist = []
feperhlist = []
for i in files:
test = plot_tools(np.load(i))
test.set_faceon()
x, y, z, m, o, fe, h = test.output("Masses","O","Fe","H")
bins = 301
xbins = np.linspace(x.min(), x.max(), bins)
ybins = np.linspace(y.min(), y.max(), bins)
hist_h, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=h)
hist_fe, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins),weights=fe)
hist_ = np.log(hist_fe/hist_h) - np.log(abd[25]/abd[0])
hh = np.nanmean(hist_)
masslist.append(m.sum())
feperhlist.append(hh)
plt.scatter(masslist,feperhlist)
plt.xlabel(r"$10^{10}$ $M_\odot/h$")
plt.ylabel("[Fe/H]")
plt.savefig("FeH-Mass.png",dpi=300)

test = plot_tools(dd)

bins = 21
plt.title(f"bins = {bins}")
xmin = -7725
ymin = -28520
xbins = np.linspace(xmin, xmin+100, bins)
ybins = np.linspace(ymin, ymin+100, bins)
hist_vy, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=vy)
hist_, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins))
hist_vx, xed, yed = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=vx)
xed, yed = np.meshgrid(xbins[1:],ybins[1:])
bins = 301
xbins = np.linspace(xmin, xmin+100, bins)
ybins = np.linspace(ymin, ymin+100, bins)
hist_m, xed_m, yed_m = np.histogram2d(x, y, bins=(xbins, ybins), weights=m)
hist_m = np.log(hist_m)
hist_vy = hist_vy/hist_
hist_vx = hist_vx/hist_
plt.pcolormesh(xed_m,yed_m,hist_m.T)
# plt.colorbar().set_label(r"velocity $y$ (km/s)")
plt.quiver(xed,yed,hist_vx.T,hist_vy.T)
plt.ylabel("ckpc/h")

from TNG_catcher import *
import japanize_matplotlib

    - import illustris_python as il

    - import pandas as pd

    - import glob

test = plot_tools(dd)

dd.files

['x',
 'y',
 'z',
 'Masses',
 'SubfindDMDensity',
 'SubfindDensity',
 'SubfindHsml',
 'Density']

x, y, z, m, density_DM, density_total = test.output("Masses",'SubfindDMDensity','SubfindDensity')

m_t = density_total * m / (density_total - density_DM)

/tmp/ipykernel_956884/1779006499.py:1: RuntimeWarning: divide by zero encountered in divide
  m_t = density_total * m / (density_total - density_DM)

m_t[648342] = m[648342]

basePath = "/home/nishihama/data/TNG50-1/output/"
snapnum = 99
with open("eROSITAbubble_subhaloID.txt", mode="r") as f:
subhalolist = [int(i) for i in f.readlines()]
dd = np.load(f"./AllCutData/subhalo{subhalolist[0]}_data.npz")
cm = il.groupcat.loadSingle(basePath, snapnum, subhaloID=subhalolist[0])["SubhaloCM"]
cmx, cmy, cmz = cm

r = np.sqrt( (x - cmx)**2 + (y - cmy)**2 + (z - cmz)**2 )

plt.plot(r,m_t,".",ms=1,c="k")
plt.yscale("log")
plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("銀河中心からの距離 (ckpc/h)")
plt.ylabel(r"Mass_total ($10^{10} M_\odot/h$)")
plt.show()

R, Ma_T = np.log10(r), np.log10(m_t)

def err(y,ys):
return np.sqrt(np.sum((y-ys)**2)/len(y))

def chi(y,ys):
# y > model
return np.sum( ((y-ys)**2)/y)

want_to_fit = [4,10,20]
plt.plot(R,Ma_T,".",ms=1,c="gray")
# plt.yscale("log")
# plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("銀河中心からの距離 (ckpc/h)")
plt.ylabel(r"Mass_total ($10^{10} M_\odot/h$)")
for i in want_to_fit:
w = np.polyfit(R, Ma_T, i)
xs = np.linspace(np.min(R),np.max(R),100)
ys = np.polyval(w,xs)
plt.plot(xs, ys, lw=1, label=f'{i} deg polyfit')
# print(f"{i}: {w}")
d = chi(np.polyval(w,R),Ma_T)
er = err(np.polyval(w,R),Ma_T)
print(f"{i}: {d}, {d <= i+1}, {i+1 - d}, {er}")
plt.ylim(np.min(Ma_T),np.max(Ma_T))
plt.legend()
plt.show()

docs.title: データの抽出時間をいかに短くするか
docs.text:
Illustris-TNGのファイルの合計容量は \(z=0\) のメインのSnapshotにおいて、2.7 TBあり、銀河や銀河団を分類するデータGroupcatでさえ5.9 GBもある。

それぞれの粒子はHDF5 ( Hierarchical Data Format – Wikipedia) に格納され、粒子の種類に応じて物理量が格納されている。

これらの物理量を用いて抽出・解析を行う。つまり２段階のプロセスが存在するのである。１段階目のプロセスと２段階目のプロセスを分けることで効率化、高速化を実現を行う。

docs.title: Version 1
docs.text:
まずとりあえず、今回必要なデータは

  • Coordinates (Dims=(N,3))
  • Velocities (Dims=(N,3))
  • Masses (Dims=N)

のみを取り出す。

flowchart LR
  a0[snap_099.0<b>.hdf5</b>]--Convert-->b0[CMVonly_099.0<b>.npz</b>]
  a1[snap_099.1<b>.hdf5</b>]--Convert-->b1[CMVonly_099.1<b>.npz</b>]
  a*[snap_099.*<b>.hdf5</b>]--Convert-->b*[CMVonly_099.*<b>.npz</b>]
  c[CMVonly<b>.npz</b>]
  d{{Using}}
  b0--Extract-->c
  b1--Extract-->c
  b*--Extract-->c
  c-->d
HDF5から抽出したら直ちにNPZファイルにして保存し、メモリを開放することで使用メモリを最小限にしている。

ただし最終的に保存したNPZファイルすべてを参照するため、メモリを爆食いしているわけでないかもしれない。

コード

コード

docs.title: Version 2
docs.text:
ChunkファイルごとにHDF5からNPZファイルに変換を行い、特定のSubhaloにカットを行う作業をしてきたが、これを一括でJuliaで行い、さらに並列計算を行った。

いままではPython(変換)+Julia(抽出)で時間が1時間超ほどだった。

flowchart LR
  a0[snap_099.0<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a1[snap_099.1<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a*[snap_099.*<b>.hdf5</b>]
  c[CMVonly<b>.npz</b>]
  d{{Using}}
  a0--Convert/Extract-->c
  a1--Convert/Extract-->c
  a*--Convert/Extract-->c
  c-->d

コード

docs.title: version 3
docs.text:
flowchart LR
  a0[snap_099.0<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a1[snap_099.1<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a*[snap_099.*<b>.hdf5</b>]
  c[AllData<b>.npz</b>]
  d{{Using}}
  a0--Convert-->c
  a1--Convert-->c
  a*--Convert-->c
  c--Extract--> d

さらにConvert部分の高速化を測るために次のようにプログラムを改良した。

flowchart TD

t1{{"@threads"}}
t2{{"@threads"}}
t*{{"@threads"}}

i1["i=1"]
i3["i=*"]

a1[get Coordinates]
a3[get Coordinates]

b1[get Velocities]
b3[get Velocities]

c1[get GFM_Metals]
c3[get GFM_Metals]

D["DATA"]

t1-->i1
t1-->i3

subgraph for
  i1-->t2
  i3-->t*

  subgraph "get_data(1)"
    t2-->a1
    t2-->b1
    t2-->c1
  end

  subgraph "get_data(*)"
    t*-->a3
    t*-->b3
    t*-->c3
  end
end

a1-->D
a3-->D
b1-->D
b3-->D
c1-->D
c3-->D

メモリ不足で強制終了。

docs.title: version 4
docs.text:
flowchart LR
  a0[snap_099.0<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a1[snap_099.1<b>.hdf5</b>]
  a*[snap_099.*<b>.hdf5</b>]

  c[Mapping File]
  d{{Using}}

  subgraph Preparation
    a0--Random Extract-->c
    a1--Random Extract-->c
    a*--Random Extract-->c
  end



  a0--Extract-->d
  a1--Extract-->d
  a*--Extract-->d

  c--> d
  Preparation-->c

cutoff.jl
using NPZ
file_list = readdir("./AllOfData_CMVonly")
cmx::Float64, cmy::Float64, cmz::Float64 = 25045.18, 5827.554, 34187.434
x, y, z, vx, vy, vz, m = Float64[], Float64[], Float64[], Float64[], Float64[], Float64[], Float64[]
h::Float64 = 0.6774
virial_radius::Float64 = 194.9481
cutoff_radius::Float64 = virial_radius*h*10
for i::Int64 in 1:length(file_list)
global x, y, z, vx, vy, vz, m
data = npzread( "./AllOfData_CMVonly/" * file_list[1])
_x::Vector{Float64} = data["x"]
_y::Vector{Float64} = data["y"]
_z::Vector{Float64} = data["z"]
_vx::Vector{Float64} = data["vx"]
_vy::Vector{Float64} = data["vy"]
_vz::Vector{Float64} = data["vz"]
_m::Vector{Float64} = data["m"]
r = sqrt.((_x .- cmx).^2 .+ (_y .- cmy).^2 .+ (_z .- cmz).^2)
_x = _x[r .< cutoff_radius]
_y = _y[r .< cutoff_radius]
_z = _z[r .< cutoff_radius]
_vx = _vx[r .< cutoff_radius]
_vy = _vy[r .< cutoff_radius]
_vz = _vz[r .< cutoff_radius]
_m = _m[r .< cutoff_radius]
x=vcat(x, _x)
y=vcat(y, _y)
z=vcat(z, _z)
vx=vcat(vx, _vx)
vy=vcat(vy, _vy)
vz=vcat(vz, _vz)
m=vcat(m, _m)
end
npzwrite("CMVonly2.npz", Dict("x" => x, "y" => y, "z" => z, "vx" => vx, "vy" => vy, "vz" => vz, "m" => m))
println("Number of particles: ", length(x))
println("DONE!")

docs.title: cutoff2.jl
docs.text:
データの抽出時間をいかに短くするか

cutoff2.jl
using NPZ
using HDF5
using Base.Threads
function get_data(filename::String, Cutoff_Fields::Vector{String})
data = Dict{String, Vector{Float64}}()
file::HDF5.File = h5open(filename, "r")
base_field::String = "PartType0/"
for _field::String in Cutoff_Fields
if _field == "Coordinates"
Coordinates::Matrix{Float64} = read(file[base_field*_field])
data["x"] = Coordinates[1,:]
data["y"] = Coordinates[2,:]
data["z"] = Coordinates[3,:]
elseif _field == "Velocities"
Velocities::Matrix{Float64} = read(file[base_field*_field])
data["vx"] = Velocities[1,:]
data["vy"] = Velocities[2,:]
data["vz"] = Velocities[3,:]
elseif _field == "GFM_Metals"
GFM_Metals::Matrix{Float64} = read(file[base_field*_field])
GFM_Metals_list::Vector{String} = ["H", "He", "C", "N", "O", "Ne", "Mg", "Si", "Fe", "Total"]
for i::Int64 in 1:length(GFM_Metals_list)
data[GFM_Metals_list[i]] = GFM_Metals[i,:]
end
else
data[_field] = read(file[base_field*_field])
end
end
return data
end
function cutoff(data::Dict{String, Vector{Float64}}, cutoff_data::Dict{String, Vector{Float64}}, cmx::Float64, cmy::Float64, cmz::Float64, cutoff_radius::Float64)
_x::Vector{Float64} = data["x"]
_y::Vector{Float64} = data["y"]
_z::Vector{Float64} = data["z"]
r::Vector{Float64} = sqrt.((_x .- cmx).^2 .+ (_y .- cmy).^2 .+ (_z .- cmz).^2)
fields_list = collect(keys(data))
for i::String in fields_list
lock(lk) do
cutoff_data[i] = vcat(cutoff_data[i], data[i][r .< cutoff_radius])
end
end
end
const Cutoff_Fields = ["Coordinates", "Velocities", "Masses", "GFM_Metals"]
cmx::Float64, cmy::Float64, cmz::Float64 = 25045.18, 5827.554, 34187.434
h::Float64 = 0.6774
virial_radius::Float64 = 194.9481
cutoff_radius::Float64 = virial_radius*h*10
file_list = readdir("../data/TNG50-1/output/snapdir_099/", join=true)
cutoff_data = Dict{String, Vector{Float64}}()
lk = ReentrantLock()
println("Threads ", Threads.nthreads())
data = get_data(file_list[1], Cutoff_Fields)
fields_list = collect(keys(data))
for j::String in fields_list
cutoff_data[j] = Float64[]
end
@time @threads for i::Int64 in 1:length(file_list)
data = get_data(file_list[i], Cutoff_Fields)
cutoff(data, cutoff_data, cmx, cmy, cmz, cutoff_radius)
println(i)
end
npzwrite("CVMM2.npz", cutoff_data)
println("Number of particles: ", length(cutoff_data["x"]))
println("DONE!")

import h5py

]

x=x,

)
